channel.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!
channel.description:
[center]Hello guy's it's Cody here and I decided to make a PI Server so apply now or miss all the fun![/center]
[center]I've been wanting to make a server for year's and now here i am doing it and i need some help![/center]
[center]What I am for in this server is perfect combat, to make all of our player's happy and to have a all around awesome server[/center]
[center]Once we get donation's It will all go to the server and it's improvement no matter what, I need a very good hoster who can guarantee a 24/7 stability satisfaction! [/center]
Here is the layout i prefer you use to apply! In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: MSN: What position do you want? (Coder,Hoster): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?:
Coder's get admin, Hoster get's Co-Owner
[center]Coder's 0/2[/center]
Ok guy's I know I will get horrible comment's for this but I need some one to portfoward and host for me (My router is messed up currently) I have already coded a lot and it is ready to go up as soon as we get the hoster and some one to portfoward it.
Ok Thank's Guy's!

item.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Not that this matters, but I would prefer a PI over Delta. Delta is WAY to un-orginized, and I wont put up with how the coding is. Which is why I use PI. Because everything has it’s on file, and not all crammed in ‘client.java’

Read full topic

item.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

hi,

Sorry for the bad english iam from The Nethelands

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Matrix
How old are you?: 17
MSN: pm me
What position do you want? (Coder,Hoster): coder/hoster/Website Dev, HOSTING WILL BE ON VPS
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: few years simple stuff like delta,pi
What time zone are you in?: The Netherlands
How long will you be on everyday?: 3-5 on weekends more
Why do you want to become part of this server?: i dont want to create a new server so i thought i just join a dev team.

I got 2 VPS
Ready to host anything.
A
let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!

item.description:
@0ll13 wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: 0ll13
How old are you?:16
MSN:ollie9529@hotmail.co.uk
What position do you want? (Coder,Hoster):Coder preferably but i can short term host if needed.
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: around 5-6 years on and off
What time zone are you in?:(UTC) Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London
How long will you be on everyday?:around 2-5 hours (can be on longer if work needs to be done)
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Taken a break from coding and hosting my own servers and just joined other servers, fixing bugs, creating forums etc… would enjoy just playing a role within a community

Read full topic
